Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class describes a board of the game. There are methods which verifies that chosen coordinate is actually on the board
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Grid()

  • Method Details

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(Coordinate coordinate)
      Method checks the coordinate if it is the part of the grid
      Parameters:
      coordinate -
      Returns:
      coordinate, if the wrong coordinate is entered returns null

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(int x, int y)
      This method is used when coordinate is taken from input
      Parameters:
      x - abscissa of input, integer value
      y - ordinate of input, integer value
      Returns:
      coordinate of input

    • validTileAround

      public java.util.List<Coordinate> validTileAround​(Coordinate from)
      This method examines the possible coordinates around of the parting point "from", keeps obtained values in array
      Parameters:
      from - of type Coordinate, the starting point of the tile
      Returns:
      array with values of possible coordinates

    • checkDestination

      public boolean checkDestination​(Coordinate from, Coordinate destination)
      Checks the destination whether it is reachable or not
      Parameters:
      from - starting point of the tile
      destination - end point of the tile
      Returns:
      set of reachable coordinates or false if there is no possible coordinates around starting point

      public boolean contains​(Coordinate coordinate)

      Returns:

    • HeightDifference

      public int HeightDifference​(Coordinate from, Coordinate destination)
      Method calculates the level difference between starting and end points of the tile
      Parameters:
      from - starting point
      destination - ending point
      Returns:
      integer value of level difference
